definition: يمن yamana u, yamina a, yamuna u (yumn, ميمنة maimana) to be lucky, fortunate II to go to the right V to see a good omen (ب in) X do. يمن yumn good luck, good fortune, prosperity, success يمن yaman and يمنة yamna right side or hand; يمنا to (at, on) the right; يمنة yamnatan do. │ شاما ويمنا to the north and south; يمنة ويسرة (yasratan) to the right and left
